sections.title: Rose Warden (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Rose Warden class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Anonymity (Ex) (Rose Warden)
sections.description: Grants a class level bonus on Bluff and Disguise checks specifically to conceal the rose warden's true identity.

sections.title: Insurgent Technique (Rose Warden)
sections.description: Grants access to various technique options including Everbloom's Wrath spell-like abilities, Holy Thorns weapon enhancement, or rogue talents, with techniques gained every 2 levels.

sections.title: Liberated Mind (Su) (Rose Warden)
sections.description: Provides a scaling bonus (+2 at low levels, +4 at 5th level) on saves against charm, compulsion, and fear effects.

sections.title: Street Sentinel (Ex) (Rose Warden)
sections.description: Grants bonuses to initiative and various skills when in urban areas, plus the ability to leave no trail while traveling in urban terrain.

sections.title: Sneak Attack (Ex) (Rose Warden)
sections.description: Functions identically to rogue sneak attack, starting at 1d6 and increasing every 2 levels, with damage bonuses stacking with other sneak attack sources.

sections.title: Voice of the Masses (Ex) (Rose Warden)
sections.description: Allows unimpeded movement through crowds and provides a class level bonus on checks to influence crowds.

sections.title: Cunning Disarm (Ex) (Rose Warden)
sections.description: Allows using Sleight of Hand instead of combat maneuver checks for disarm attempts without provoking attacks of opportunity.

sections.title: Insurrectionist (Su) (Rose Warden)
sections.description: Grants freedom of movement effects for a limited number of rounds per day, plus the ability to share this with nearby allies once per day.

sections.title: Advanced Insurgent Technique (Rose Warden)
sections.description: Unlocks more powerful technique options including advanced rogue talents, teleportation abilities, precision damage enhancements, and wall of thorns spell-like ability.

sections.title: Obfuscate (Su) (Rose Warden)
sections.description: Allows using Stealth while being observed and hiding in the open without cover when in urban areas.

sections.title: Rallying Courage (Su) (Rose Warden)
sections.description: Grants immunity to fear effects and allows giving allies a second save against fear conditions once per day.

sections.title: Smite Tyranny (Su) (Rose Warden)
sections.description: When dealing sneak attack damage to lawful or evil targets, can add extra damage and potentially stagger the target with a failed save.
